attributes.action: King Charles | Call to dissolve Keir Starmer as government
attributes.additional_details:
Scrapped £28bn green investment plan
Reversed pledge to abolish tuition fees
Abandoned promise to nationalize key public services
Ruled out restoring free movement with the EU
Cut disability benefits by up to £6bn
Slashed winter fuel payments for pensioners by £1.5bn
Broke promise to uphold workers’ rights reforms
Failed to reinstate child benefit for higher earners
U-turned on wealth tax proposals
attributes.background: I am calling on King Charles to dissolve Keir Starmer as the Labour Party’s government leader because he has repeatedly broken key promises made to the British public.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions that request actions by the King, as these are decisions for the crown, and not the Government or House of Commons.

You may wish to sign this petition that calls for the same action:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
